transcript_chunks.text: so much for joining us today we're going to take a quick break though tell you about our sponsors today andy who do we have for our first sponsor this episode of kind of a funny morning show is brought to you by snakes every year millions of snakes have to live outside without a warm home to come home to but that doesn't have to be the case you could take us this is my first time reading this snakes are great they're like lizards without feet hey did you know you could put us hey did you know you can put a snake in your pocket and take it into the movie theater with you put a little friend in your pocket and take them everywhere snakes they make good pets but even better friends that's the first ad read
